description: WHY SHOULD YOU BUY TECH ARMOR SCREEN PROTECTORS?DID YOU KNOW - A screen full of noticeable scratches will lower your resale value!PRESERVE YOUR INVESTMENT AND MAXIMIZE YOUR RESALE VALUE - The Tech Armor HD Clear screen protector will pay for itself as your first line of line of defense against scratches that will greatly reduce the resale value of your Fire HD 7" (2012 1st generation)!No detail has been overlooked with this "Best-In-Class" product from Tech Armor - the industry leader in screen protection.If you will only accept theBESTfor your Fire HD 7" (2012 1st generation), then look no further:BESTAnti-Glare technologyBESTAnti-Fingerprint coatingBESTBubble free installationBESTProtection from ScratchesBESTTouchscreen AccuracyBESTHassle-Free Lifetime WarrantyThe Tech Armor Antiglare screen protector design combines scratch stopping protection with a unique matte finish that dramatically improves screen visibility in bright sunlight or bright office lights.Why not make it easier to use your devices wherever you are, whenever you want? In addition to reducing glare, these screen protectors resist fingerprints and protect your device screen from scratches that can greatly reduce its resale value.COMPATIBILITY:Kindle Fire HD 7" (2012 1st generation), All Carriers, All ModelsThe TECH ARMOR Anti-Glare Screen Protector Kit Includes:- Three (3) Anti-Glare / Anti-Fingerprint Screen Protectors- Installation Instructions- Smoothing Card- Microfiber Cloth- Dust Removal Tape- Retail Packaging- Tech Armor Lifetime Replacement Warranty
title: Tech Armor Kindle Fire HD 7" (2012 1st generation) Anti-Glare/Anti-Fingerprint (Matte) Screen Protectors [3-Pack] Lifetime Warranty
